rta.name: industry_fit
rta.definition: How well the customer's industry aligns with the product's target market
rta.guidelines: Score based on industry match and market presence

rta.name: company_size
rta.definition: Company size alignment with product's ideal customer profile
rta.guidelines: Score based on employee count and revenue alignment

rta.name: pain_points
rta.definition: How well the product addresses customer's identified pain points
rta.guidelines: Score based on pain point alignment and severity

rta.name: product_fit
rta.guidelines: Score based on feature alignment and use case match

rta.name: geographic_market_fit
rta.definition: Geographic alignment between customer location and product availability
rta.guidelines: Score based on market presence and localization

rta_enterprise.name: budget_authority
rta_enterprise.definition: Customer's budget authority and financial capacity
rta_enterprise.guidelines: Score based on budget size and decision-making authority

rta_enterprise.name: technical_fit
rta_enterprise.definition: Technical requirements alignment with product capabilities
rta_enterprise.guidelines: Score based on technical complexity and integration needs

rta_enterprise.name: decision_timeline
rta_enterprise.guidelines: Score based on purchase timeline and urgency indicators

rta_enterprise.name: competitive_situation
rta_enterprise.guidelines: Score based on competitive threats and our advantages

rta_enterprise.name: stakeholder_engagement
rta_enterprise.definition: Level of stakeholder engagement and champion strength
rta_enterprise.guidelines: Score based on champion strength and stakeholder buy-in
